title: The Bachelorette's Angie Kent VOMITS on her first date with Jackson Garlick
text:
Things went awry during Angie Kent's first date with suitor Jackson Garlick on Wednesday's episode of The Bachelorette.

After selecting the 25-year-old for a solo date, it wasn't long before Jackson and Angie, 29, took to the sky in a helicopter.

But after getting swept up in the excitement of it all, Angie momentarily forgot she suffers from motion sickness.

Scroll down for video

Bad date: Things turned awry during Angie Kent's first date with suitor Jackson Garlick on Wednesday's episode of The Bachelorette

'It's so pretty. It was beautiful looking around and seeing the ocean so high up. But this gal forgets that she gets motion sickness,' she quipped.

Noticing Angie was looking a little off-colour, a concerned Jackson asked her if she was feeling okay.

'This is... nup. It's really hot in here. Imagine if I got sick in here,' she remarked to Jackson.

Flying high: After selecting Jackson Garlick for a solo date, it wasn't long before the 25-year-old and Angie, 29, took to the sky in a helicopter

Sold out: Getting worried, Jackson then started searching frantically for a sick bag, only to realise there were none

Getting worried, Jackson then started searching frantically for a sick bag, only to realise there wasn't one.

'You can spew in my top pocket if you want,' he conceded, with Angie telling him, 'That would be the worst thing ever.'

Jackson then tried his best to distract her, telling Angie to 'focus on things that are fun'.

Feeling sick: But after getting swept up in the excitement of it all, Angie momentarily forgot she suffers from motion sickness

'It's so pretty. It was beautiful looking around and seeing the ocean so high up. But this gal forgets that she gets motion sickness,' she quipped

But it didn't seem to work, with Angie instructing Jackson to help her loosen her top after she began overheating.

'First date, straight up I'm asking Jackson to take my top off, and it's not for sexy reasons,' she later said.

Despite claiming the date was a 'disaster', Jackson assured her it was okay.

Taking her mind off it: Jackson then tried his best to distract her, telling Angie to 'focus on things that are fun'

Not long to go! 'I think we're on the home stretch. We're landing, so... keep your eye on the prize. About to touch down,' Jackson calmly told her

'I do feel like I'm gonna be sick,' she told him.

'I think we're on the home stretch. We're landing, so... keep your eye on the prize. About to touch down,' Jackson calmly told her.

Thankfully, Angie was able to hold it in until the helicopter landed safely back on the ground, after which she jumped out and could be heard vomiting.

'First date, straight up I'm asking Jackson to take my top off, and it's not for sexy reasons,' she later said

But they were able to laugh about it later on, with Angie admitting Jackson had made her 'feel so comfortable' in her time of need.

'As great as it is that I spewed on our first date... I want to know more about you,' she told him, prompting Jackson to laugh.

Despite having concerns about whether Jackson is 'ready to settle down', she rewarded him with a rose.
description: Things turned awry during Angie Kent's first date with suitor Jackson Garlick on Wednesday's episode of The Bachelorette.
authors: Demeter Stamell For Daily Mail Australia
